title: Star Wars: Darth Vader, Vol. 2: Shadows and Secrets
description: Bounty Hunters on the attack--against the Empire! Vader has a new mission to do for the Empire. Unfortunately, it's completely at odds with his own mission. What's a Dark Lord to do? Plus: Who is Tagge's mysterious new agent?COLLECTING: Darth Vader #7-12.
author: Kieron Gillen
